knimeNode.name: Segment Cropper
knimeNode.shortDescription: Given input images and corresponding labelings, the segment cropper crops all possible segments from the input image.

fullDescription.intro: Given input images and corresponding labelings, the segment cropper crops all possible segments from the input image. e.g.: This node can be used to work on the individual segments upcoming nodes.
